long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of only being able to see letter grades on PowerSchool? This extension calculates the actual numeric percentage grade that you have in the class. Simply enable the addon, and allow access to PowerSchool, and whenever you visit a grades page you will be able to see your current grade in the class.
